divs: Sighting Details2 UFO spheres appeared out of nowhere right over my house.. they looked like glowing lights. They were apart from each other by approximately 15-20 ft. They were about 50ft high. As they went over my house the 1 sphere ascended up in the sky to the point where it was out of view
Summary: 2 UFO spheres appeared out of nowhere right over my house.. they looked like glowing lights. They were apart from each other by approximately 15-20 ft
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around September 20th 2013
